tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_number VARCHAR(20),
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
   violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   driver_license_no TEXT,
   violation_date DATE,
   violation_type TEXT,
   fine_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fines (
   fine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   violation_id INT,
   officer_badge_no TEXT,
   fine_amount DECIMAL,
   payment_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_license_number STRING,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_type STRING,
  fine_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
    violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_plate_number VARCHAR(10),
    violation_date DATE,
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    fine_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE fine_rates (
    violation_type VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    min_fine DECIMAL,
    max_fine DECIMAL,
    fine_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE law_enforcement_agencies (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(100),
    agency_city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE fine_payment_records (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    paid_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Drivers (
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(100),
  driver_age INT,
  driver_address VARCHAR(150)
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (
  vehicle_license_plate VARCHAR(20) PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_year INT,
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Fines (
  fine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Law_Enforcement_Agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100),
  agency_location VARCHAR(150),
  officer_name VARCHAR(100),
  officer_badge_number VARCHAR(20)
)
